summary: This issue was first identified by Valor Healthcare, Inc. on 01/08/13 at 12:10 PM after Veteran A's wife contacted the RN Administrator at the Federal Way Community Based Outpatient Clinic (CBOC) and informed her that she discovered that her husband was given a copy of Veteran B's prescription at the time of discharge at the CBOC along with his own. The prescription contained Veteran B's SSN. The duplicate prescription was returned to the CBOC and destroyed. The Associate responsible for the mix-up has been reminded to use caution when passing off Protected Health Information/Personally Identifiable Information (PHI/PII) to assure proper identification

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
